TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit TableAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class TableAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class TableAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 将某个类指定为与数据库表相关联的实体类。

span.span: Designates a class as an entity class that is associated with a database table.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 使用此属性可将类指定为与数据库表或视图关联的实体类。Use this attribute to designate a class as an entity class that is associated with a database table or view. [!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq](~/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)] 将具有类视为类视为持久性类的属性。 treats classes that have the attribute as persistent classes. [!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq](~/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)] 支持仅单表映射。 supports only single-table mapping. 也就是说，一个实体类必须映射到一个数据库表，和你不能在同一时间将数据库表映射到多个类。That is, an entity class must be mapped to exactly one database table, and you cannot map a database table to multiple classes at the same time. 可以使用属性的属性来指定表的名称，可以选择使用架构名称来限定表名称。You can use the property of the attribute to specify a name for the table, and you can optionally use the schema name to qualify a table name. 如果不通过使用指定名称属性，表名称被假定为与类名称相同。If you do not specify a name by using the property, the table name is assumed to be the same as the class name. ## 架构限定的名称Schema-qualified Names 您可以选择使用架构名称来限定表名称。You can optionally use the schema name to qualify a table name. 默认情况下，左侧的第一期的令牌字符串被视为架构名称。By default, the token to the left of the first period in the string is considered to be the schema name. 表名称被视为名称的余下部分。The remainder of the name is considered to be the table name. 提供程序加引号作为相应的表名称。The provider quotes the table name as appropriate. 例如， [!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq](~/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)] SQL Server 提供程序可确保，则使用方括号至少所需的位置。For example, the [!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq](~/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)] provider for SQL Server makes sure that brackets are used at least where they are needed. > [!NOTE] > 在某些情况下，您必须显式属性由于对 SQL Server 提供程序不能自动的括号。In some cases, you must explicitly quote attributes because the SQL Server provider cannot auto-quote. 下表显示了一些示例。The following table shows some examples. |CaseCase|示例： 标识符名称Example: Identifier Name|示例： 预期的字符串中属性Example: Expected String in Attributes|否则为...Otherwise…| |----------|------------------------------|--------------------------------------------|----------------| |架构名称包含句点Schema name contains a period|架构:"A.B"Schema: "A.B"

表:"C"Table: "C"|"[A.B]。C""[A.B].C"|假定第一个期间为单独的表名称的架构名称。The first period is assumed to separate the schema name from the table name.| |架构/表名称开头 `@`Schema/Table name starts with `@`|“@SomeName”"@SomeName"|"[@SomeName]""[@SomeName]"|假定为参数名称。Assumed to be a parameter name.| |架构的开头`[`结尾 `]`Schema starts with `[` and ends with `]`|"[Schema.Table]""[Schema.Table]"|"[[架构]。[表]]]""[[Schema].[Table]]]"|不带引号的标识符类似于带引号的标识符。The unquoted identifier resembles a quoted identifier.| |表的前`[`结尾 `]`Table starts with `[` and ends with `]`|"[表]""[Table]"|"[[表]]]""[[Table]]]"|不带引号的标识符类似于带引号的标识符。The unquoted identifier resembles a quoted identifier.| ## Examples [!code-csharp[DLinqCustomize#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/DLinqCustomize/cs/Program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DLinqCustomize#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/DLinqCustomize/vb/Module1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置表或视图的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the table or view.

value.span: 默认情况下，此值与类名称相同。

span.span: By default, the value is the same as the name of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果不通过使用指定名称，表名称被假定为与类名称相同。If you do not specify a name by using , the table name is assumed to be the same as the class name. > [!NOTE] > 您可以选择使用架构名称来限定表名 (例如，Schema3.Table5)。You can optionally use a schema name to qualify the table name (for example, Schema3.Table5). 默认情况下，左侧的第一期的令牌字符串被视为该架构名称，并为表名称的其余部分。By default, the token to the left of the first period in the string is considered to be the schema name, and the rest to be the table name. 在下面的示例中，默认表名`Customer`，更改为`Customers`。In the following example, the default table name, `Customer`, is changed to `Customers`. ## Examples [!code-csharp[DLinqCustomize#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/DLinqCustomize/cs/Program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DLinqCustomize#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/DLinqCustomize/vb/Module1.vb#1)]
